changelog:
## New Features
- Added accessory options for the Trendy Tourist Suit (remove watch, remove scarf, and a number of belt-related options)
- Added accessory options for Subject 47 (remove EKG and add shoes)
- However, please note that the Subject 47 options can not currently be used on Carpathian Mountains, as the game will crash
- Copied over the "Swap Brown Shoes" options for The Undying Look and the Suburban Suit with Driving Gloves from NMDG
